select a.id id, a.return_order_code returnOrderCode, a.sku_code skuCode, a.sku_name skuName, a.picture_url pictureUrl, a.spec spec, a.color_name colorName, a.model model, a.base_product_content baseProductContent, a.unit_code unitCode, a.unit_name unitName, a.zero_disassembly_coefficient zeroDisassemblyCoefficient, a.give_promotion givePromotion, a.product_line_num originalLineNum, a.product_status productStatus, group_concat(b.batch_number) batchNumber from return_order_info_item a left join order_info_item_product_batch b on a.sku_code = b.sku_code where a.return_order_code = #{code} and order_code = #{orderCode} group by a.id;
